The user needs help with internet connectivity issues. The details they should provide when prompted:

- When did you first notice the connectivity issues?
- Are the issues occurring on all devices or just specific ones?
- Have you tried any troubleshooting steps, such as restarting your modem or router?
- What is the model number of your modem/router?
- Are there any error messages displayed when the internet cuts out?
- Is there a consistent time of day when the interruptions occur?
